rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0001
rows.name: We've arrived at Menisuna Valley, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0001_1
rows.name: It's Valley of Oblivion, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0001_2
rows.name:
Valley of Oblivion?
What's that, meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0001_3
rows.name: It's the name of this continent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0001_4
rows.name: What are you saying, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0001_5
rows.name:
This is land where sandstorms rage
and steal travelers' sight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0001_6
rows.name: Called Menisuna Valley.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0001_7
rows.name: It has a proper name given by our ancestors, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0001_8
rows.name:
Don't go giving it weird names
behind the natives' backs, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0001_9
rows.name: S-Sorry[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0001_10
rows.name:
Since you seem repentant,
I'll forgive you this time, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0001_12
rows.name: Nothing here[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0002
rows.name:
Strange.
Even if there was nothing for comparison,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0003
rows.name:
it's hard to believe it was too small
to be seen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0004
rows.name: Right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0005
rows.name: Oh, Elma-san, look...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0006
rows.name: Aliens I haven't seen before.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0007
rows.name:
Hold on.
Looks like I can pick up their conversation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0008
rows.name:
Impossible, yo!
That's why I said we couldn't do it alone![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0009
rows.name: Saying that now won't help![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0010
rows.name: If we don't do something, everyone on the ship will...![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0011
rows.name: But but but, how do we destroy the turrets, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0012
rows.name: There are surely Growth soldiers swarming there, yo!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0013
rows.name: Doesn't look like Growth soldiers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0014
rows.name: Judging from the conversation, It sounded like they're fighting against them, to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0015
rows.name:
Tatsu knows, meh.
If I remember right, they're called the Ma-non, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0016
rows.name:
They're guys who came to this planet
about a year before you all arrived, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0018
rows.name:
What's wrong?
Something suspicious?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0019
rows.name: No[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0020
rows.name:
Not just Tatsu, but Growth and those aliens...
I was wondering why we can converse.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0021
rows.name: Ah, certainly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_JNK0010
rows.name: Guess

rows.label: xs05050100_SEL0011
rows.name: Say they understand Earth language.

rows.label: xs05050100_JNK0020
rows.name: Speculate

rows.label: xs05050100_SEL0021
rows.name: Passionately claim there's a translator device.

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0022
rows.name:
You think so?[ST:wide ]―
Tatsu, do you know our language?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0023
rows.name: That might be it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0024
rows.name:
But when we talk with Tatsu,
we aren't using the [System:Ruby rt=Device ]terminal[/System:Ruby], right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0025
rows.name: Tatsu knows Earth language![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0026
rows.name: Tatsu, do you know our language?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0027
rows.name: Don't know, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0028
rows.name: Then what language are you speaking?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0029
rows.name:
What language? Nopon, meh!
You're all very good at Nopon, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0030
rows.name: See?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0031
rows.name:
If body type and skeleton differ,
the structure of the vocal organs changes too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0032
rows.name: Pronouncing Earth language should be difficult for aliens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0033
rows.name: And yet, here we are, conversing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0034
rows.name:
Being able to talk without being able to make the sounds?
That's impossible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0035
rows.name: Normally thinking, yes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0036
rows.name:
But what if words aren't
being perceived as sound,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0037
rows.name: but are being recognized as intent instead?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0038
rows.name:
If there's something on this planet
that makes that possible[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0039
rows.name: Elma-san, you seem quite pleased about something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0040
rows.name:
Doesn't figuring out this kind of phenomenon,
sound like fun?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0041
rows.name: Stimulation for intellectual curiosity, huh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0042
rows.name:
Kind of like Lu-san.
That's unexpected.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0043
rows.name:
Never mind that!
Come on, let's hurry, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0044
rows.name:
Go help, so Tatsu can be worshipped
as a hero, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0045
rows.name: Maybe I should just eat him already?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0046
rows.name: Mehmehmeh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05050100_MSG0047
rows.name:
I don't know if we can be of help to them, but
first let's try talking to them.[ST:wait ]
